recommendations: “Naman is the most passionate Product Manager I have had the pleasure of working with. He has envisioned and built some really amazing solutions while in the Internshala team. He has sound knowledge of tech and is a fairly technically minded person. He is extremely rigorous in everything he does; analytics, design, solution building, documentation or even something as simple as writing an email. I would recommend Naman for anything that requires utmost dedication/ownership, ability to solve complex problems with simple solutions, strong interpersonal skills, and an overall passion for the product that he works with.” Show less

“I had the pleasure of working with Naman for 3 years and he's an exceptional, dedicated Product Manager. Naman has a deep understanding of the product and was constantly working to improve it, whether it was a small feature update, a complete revamp, or creating a product from scratch. He always approached projects with a collaborative and open-minded attitude, which made working with him a pleasure. Naman's ability to balance business goals and user needs is remarkable, and he consistently put the user experience first. I highly recommend Naman for any Product Management role and feel fortunate to have had the opportunity to work with him.” Show less
